casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Richard N. GREGORY. No. 113P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of March 2007 by Defendant to Alter or Amend the Judgment:

*393"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
